content: How can you move a Jira from "Considered for Future Use" to "Unresolved"? I can't find any button to do this, or to move a tracker from Considered for Future use to any status that means "we are not considering this, but haven't voted on it yet". And "Considered for Future Use" isn't in the Jira workflow diagram.
That's usually done after a publication request. It will be moved back to Unresolved
Who initiates the publication request? We have a bunch of trackers that were deferred in the R4 release, and should probably be on our list to look at for R5. But they are all still marked as CFFU.

@Lynn Laakso normally re-opens those items once publication occurs. If this step has been missed (as it might have occasionally), I'd start by asking her. That said, you should have a re-open transition available to you if you have other Jira management capabiliteis
@Cooper Thompson what Jira issues?
FHIR-17671. Note that I tried a few buttons to get it to re-open, so its now marked as Triaged/Persuasive. But getting that back to Triaged/Unresolved is what I want.
@Lloyd McKenzie can you help with this one? triaged/persuasive reverting to unresolved is not in my wheelhouse...
That's not possible except for an administrator. Once you've put in a draft resolution, you can change the proposed resolution, but you can't remove a resolution entirely.
